messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: Re: Taiga Drama Videos
messages.msgSnippet: If you can find some to rent or if you can buy the condensed versions of any of these I think you will enjoy them. The older samurai soaps were a bit err..
messages.messageBody:
"If you can find some to rent or if you can buy the condensed versions of
any of these I think you will enjoy them. The older samurai soaps were a
bit err.. soapier so I usually didn't watch them"

Actually I have from Hideyoshi on the whole series for each. Plus condensed
versions of just about all the other ones.
